definitions.title: n.pr.loc.
definitions.body: conquered by Isr. Am 6:13 (so Gr We Now GASm, cf. also [[לאׁ דְבָר]] p. 520 supr.; LXX and most sub [[קֶרֶן]]
); prob. in Bashan, = Karnain 1Ma 5:43, 1Ma 5:44, Karnion 2Ma 12:21; also in ´[[עַשְׁתְּרוֹת ק]]: Ge 14:5 (v. III. [[עַשְׁתָּרוֹת]] p.800 supr.).
